update maple_car
branch = #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_status = #{carStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
engine_number = #{engineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pick_date = #{pickDate,jdbcType=DATE},
car_licence_front_image = #{carLicenceFrontImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_licence_back_image = #{carLicenceBackImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_date = #{transferDate,jdbcType=DATE},
redeem_date = #{redeemDate,jdbcType=DATE},
gps_number = #{gpsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gps_phone = #{gpsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update maple_car set branch = #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_status = #{carStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine_number = #{engineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pick_date = #{pickDate,jdbcType=DATE}, car_licence_front_image = #{carLicenceFrontImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_licence_back_image = #{carLicenceBackImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_date = #{transferDate,jdbcType=DATE}, redeem_date = #{redeemDate,jdbcType=DATE}, gps_number = #{gpsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gps_phone = #{gpsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
